content:
path /v3/litecoin/block/hash/i
operationId LtcGetBlockHash
parameters
description The number of blocks preceding a particular block on a block chain
in path
name i
required True
schema
type number
summary Get Litecoin Block hash
description 5 credits per API callGet Litecoin Block hash Returns hash of the block to get the block detailExamples of using this endpoint with the Tatum JS SDK can be found in Tatum LTC SDK
responses
200
schema
type object
hash
type string
description Block hash
description OK
